name: Advertisement
description: An ad displays third-party promotional content.

name: Card
description: A card displays site content in a manner similar to a playing card.

props.name: Card.Content
props.description: A card can contain blocks of content or extra content meant to be formatted separately from the main content.

props.name: Card.Description
props.description: A card can contain a description with one or more paragraphs.

props.name: Card.Group
props.description: A group of cards.

props.name: Card.Header
props.description: A card can contain a header.

props.name: Card.Meta
props.description: A card can contain content metadata.

name: Comment
description: A comment displays user feedback to site content.

props.name: Comment.Author
props.description: A comment can contain an author.

props.name: Comment.Action
props.description: A comment can contain an action.

props.name: Comment.Actions
props.description: A comment can contain an list of actions a user may perform related to this comment.

props.name: Comment.Avatar
props.description: A comment can contain an image or avatar.

props.name: Comment.Content
props.description: A comment can contain content.

props.name: Comment.Group
props.description: Comments can be grouped.

props.name: Comment.Metadata
props.description: A comment can contain metadata about the comment, an arbitrary amount of metadata may be defined.

props.name: Comment.Text
props.description: A comment can contain text.

name: Feed
description: A feed presents user activity chronologically.

props.name: Feed.Date
props.description: An event or an event summary can contain a date.

props.name: Feed.Event
props.description: A feed contains an event.

props.name: Feed.Extra
props.description: A feed can contain an extra content.

props.name: Feed.Label
props.description: An event can contain an image or icon label.

props.name: Feed.Like
props.description: A feed can contain a like element.

props.name: Feed.Meta
props.description: A feed can contain a meta.

props.name: Feed.Summary
props.description: A feed can contain a summary.

props.name: Feed.User
props.description: A feed can contain a user element.

name: Item
description: An item view presents large collections of site content for display.

name: Statistic
description: A statistic emphasizes the current value of an attribute.
